mapper.sql: id, course_id, teacher, course_sum, up_time, week, start_time, end_time,plan_group_id
mapper.select:
select sc.course_id, sc.up_time, sc.week, oc.user_id, su.unit_id, sc.teacher from second_course sc left join order_course oc on sc.id = oc.second_course_id left join sys_user su on oc.user_id = su.user_id left join sys_unit s on su.unit_id = s.unit_id
where su.type in (0,1, 2)
